channel.title: Specific integer to trig
channel.description: Hello! i'm triyng to figure out how to translate a specific integer value to a trigger. like i would have an object listening to a sequence of numbers, let's say 1 to 10 and i want that each time the value 8 appears it triggers an envelope. the value to recognize changes overtime because of the length and offset of the sequence of numbers also might change, but i already have the way to have the values i want to recognize, now i'm working on how to make it trigger something. thanks anybody reaching out, hope i made myself clear back to the patcher!

item.title: Specific integer to trig

item.description:
@kale wrote:

Thanks! looks like it should work for my purpose, i'm triyng that tomorrow

item.title: Specific integer to trig
item.dc:creator: @borututuforte
item.description:
@borututuforte wrote:

It should work with "const/i" for your specific integer, "math/==" and "tiar/logic/rising" for the trigger.

Read full topic

like i would have an object listening to a sequence of numbers, let's say 1 to 10 and i want that each time the value 8 appears it triggers an envelope. the value to recognize changes overtime because of the length and offset of the sequence of numbers also might change, but i already have the way to have the values i want to recognize, now i'm working on how to make it trigger something.
